text: Louis Charles Nistico (January 25, 1953 - November 27, 2020) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player. During his career he played three games in the National Hockey League and 186 games in the World Hockey Association. The Colorado Rockies, Toronto Toros, and Birmingham Bulls were some of the teams his played for during his career. Nistico was born in Thunder Bay, Ontario. Nistico died on November 27, 2020 at the age of 67. Not many London Knights made their mark like Leapin' Lou NisticoFormer NHLer Lou Nistico dies at 67 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1953 births Category:American Hockey League players Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Central Professional Hockey League players Category:Colorado Rockies (NHL) players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:2020 deaths Category:Ontario Hockey League players Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay Category:World Hockey Association players
title: Lou Nistico
